page.title: 05Shop Survey-Whalley Village
page.content:
A total of 35 shops were counted in the village of{Whalley,}the majority on {King St.}and are listed below.
{SHOPS Newsagents 2 Hairdressers 3 Butchers 2 Clothes/Shoes 3 Chip Shops 2 Antiques 3 Sweet Shops 2 {Gift/Craft 6} Bread/Cakes 2 Launderette 1 Cafe/Tea 2 D.I.Y.(Paint) 1 Supermarket 1 Greengrocer 1 Post Office 1 Restaurant 1 Chemist 1 Off Licence 1
The village also has four Public Houses,two Banks and three Estate Agents/Building Societies. The life span of many of the shops is quite short, particularly the{Gift/ {Craft}shops.Three{new shops}will open soon-2{Craft Shops}and 1{Antique Shop.
